programme.desc: Meet the new Shark PowerDetect Upright Vacuum with features like DuoClean Detect Technology, self-cleaning brush roll and odor neutralizing and you will be cleaning faster, smarter and better!

programme.title: Rizzoli & Isles
programme.desc: A viral video of Jane jeopardizes her career and reputation; the squad tries to solve a murder case involving a conspiracy theorist.

programme.title: Rizzoli & Isles
programme.desc: A popular high-school teacher is killed in a hit and run; Jane is preoccupied with Lt. Martinez's apparent favoritism toward his own drug unit.

programme.title: Rizzoli & Isles
programme.desc: Frankie Jr. is brought in to help with a murder case involving a youth hockey league; Cailin asks to stay with Maura; Maura has trouble living with a teenager.

programme.title: Major Crimes
programme.desc: While looking into purchasing a new home, Flynn seeks input from Provenza and Buzz; Buzz continues to investigate the circumstances surrounding his father's murder.

programme.title: Major Crimes
programme.desc: Det. Julio Sanchez's application to become a foster parent is jeopardized by his reaction to a gruesome murder; the Major Crimes Division finds a chopped up body burned to bits in a barbecue pit.

programme.title: Major Crimes
programme.desc: The city's tourist industry is threatened by an English journalist when a pair of British tourists are attacked on their second honeymoon in Venice Beach; Rusty's biological mother tries to make peace with him.

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: After the FBI fails to get Alexis back, Castle takes matters into his own hands; Castle learns that his daughter's kidnapping may be a part of a larger and more sinister agenda.

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Castle and Beckett tackle one of their creepiest cases yet when a woman appears to have been scared to death by a "haunted" DVD; Castle fears for his life after he accidentally watches the video.

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: When a body is discovered in an industrial cake mixer, the murder is traced to an Irish gang and a bar owner named Siobhan O'Doul (Cara Buono); Detective Ryan reveals a history with Siobhan from his time working under cover in narcotics.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is forced to put in overtime while searching for a suspect presumed dead when working on a case over Christmas.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: McGee is held captive in a women's prison after a guard's murder leads to a takeover.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: After Ducky is stabbed at a crime scene, the team uncovers disturbing secrets from the doctor's past.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team discovers a link between a sergeant's murder and his possibly treasonous private life.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Demons of the past come back to haunt Gibbs when he finds a cryptic message waiting for him at a crime scene.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A murder prompts the reopening of one of Tony's old investigations, leading Gibbs and DiNozzo to reverse roles to solve the case.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: When an agent is gunned down, Gibbs and Tony try to locate a woman in the desert who might have answers about his murder.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team discovers a link between a sergeant's murder and his possibly treasonous private life.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Incredible Shrinking Wizard: Gargamel has thrown in his slime pond so much poisonous muck that the water becomes enchanted and Gargamel, after falling in, suddenly finds himself much smaller that he would wish. Actually he is going to be so small that Papa Smurf will save him!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Circus For Baby: It must be a coincidence: just as an elephant crosses the forest and meets baby Smurf, the Smurfs decide to create a big Smurf Circus. They are going to meet the infernal sorcerer Balthazar and Baby Smurf will have a lot of fun...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hopping Cough Smurfs: The evil wizard Gargamel spreads the forest with the germs of the uncontrollable hopping cough. Baby Smurf is the first victim and all the Village of the Smurfs goes frantic with worry... Fortunately, Papa Smurf thinks there might be a cure.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurf On Wood: The evil wizard Gargamel once again meets Esmeralda, the gypsy fortune-teller, and she finds a novel way of getting the gold coin that Gargamel imprudently shows her. But the Smurfs in their turn are tricked into believing there is such a thing as a good-luck tree...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Little Orange Horse With Gold Shoes: Sliding down a rainbow, a little winged horse loses a golden shoe. He meets the Smurfette and she helps him look for his lost horseshoe. They fall in love somehow, for who could be unmoved by the charm of a little orange horse... Or of a Smurfette?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Master Smurf: There is an evil power in the Titan's crown that Miner Smurf finds underground. And Greedy Smurf is the Smurf to fall victim to it. Then Gargamel comes up with some new schemes to destroy the Smurfs, and everything gets hopelessly tangled.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Winged Wizard: Determined to fly over Smurf village to catch a Smurf to take to the Wizard's Convention, Gargamel invokes his Book of Spells to help him. A series of funny flying machine mishaps occur and Gargamel is once more the laughing stock of the Wizard's Convention.

programme.title: The First Telesmurf
programme.desc: Papa Smurf pours a magic potion over the new Smurf-melon patch, which instantly grows and grows all over the village and forest. The Smurfs use the blossoms as a telephone, but before Gargamel can trace their voices, the flowers turn into melons and telesmurf is no more.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hats Off To Smurf: In his search for something new, Vanity dons a Gargamel-made magic hat that transforms his face into a mess. Through trickery, Papa Smurf gets the antidote from the wicked wizard and once more, Vanity is beautiful.

programme.title: No Time For Smurfs
programme.desc: Handy, Brainy, Clumsy, and Smurfette discover the hourglass of time in a cave and due to their bungling, time spins erratically out of control for all of the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Chief Record Smurf: Due to a wild experiment Clumsy is able to store endless knowledge into his memory. Gargamel captures him, trying to unlock Papa Smurf's invisibility formula, but at the last minute, Clumsy tricks him with the wrong ingredients.

programme.title: Good Neighbour Smurf
programme.desc: When Brainy's house burns down, he moves in with his fellow Smurfs and one by one they kick him out because of his meddling.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Little Smurf Confidence: Papa Smurf gives Weakling a special cream to wear that will restore his strength. Shortly after, he is awarded for his daring deeds of strength and his confidence really soars when he realizes the cream is smurfberry jam.

programme.title: Harmony Steals The Show
programme.desc: Harmony unwittingly signs a contract with Ghost Writer for a symphony that imprisons him in a ghostly nightclub for life! Papa Smurf demands a jury trial with ghostly jurors and a judge that finds Harmony innocent and Ghost Writer guilty of plagiarism.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hogatha's Hearththrob: Hogatha the witch promises Gargamel a magical whistle if he will introduce her to the warlock of her dreams. But they are both deceived by each other's trickery: Gargamel dresses up as the warlock, and Hogatha's magical whistle is only a birdcall.

programme.title: A Bell For Azrael
programme.desc: Gargamel puts a spell on a bell attached to Azrael's tail that will lead the cat to the Smurfs. Papa Smurf outwits him with a counter-spell that leads the wizard to Big Mouth instead of the tasty Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette For A Day: Hefty dresses like Smurfette to lure an enamored gnome, Piltkin, away from the Smurf Village. They burrow underground and meet a female gnome who falls in love with Piltkin who then casts Smurfette aside for his new heartthrob.

programme.title: The Magic Earrings
programme.desc: Hogatha manages to obtain the magic golden earrings of Sonoria that will enable her to hear Smurfy voices from afar. Following Lazy's snores, she almost reaches the Smurf Village until Harmony's horn-blasts blow in her earrings and she flies home in a rage.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Every Picture Smurfs A Story: The evil Maestro's magical paints have the power to transport his models onto canvas – forever! Papa Smurf directs Painter to switch his paints and before long, Maestro is enshrined in a picture next to his dream girl, Smurfette.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Golden Smurf Award: Hogatha disguises herself as the Golden Smurf Award to catch the Smurfs in order to use them as the main ingredient in her beauty cream. Vanity convinces her to try his recipe and before long, the wicked sorceress is covered with mud and sent careening over the hills into Gargamel's house.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Last Smurfberry: Papa Smurf organizes a crew to sail to Smurfberry Island because Gargamel has killed all of the trees except one to trap the Smurfs. Gargamel follows them, but once more fails to catch them because the Witch of Smurfberry Island sends her nose-eating seagulls after them.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Miracle Smurfer: The Smurfs learn that the mind is more powerful than matter when they are fooled by a quack's outrageously expensive miracle tonic. But Papa Smurf cures the Smurfs of their temporary naiveté and the charlatan of his villainy.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - All Hallowseve: While out on a mischief-making mission to destroy the Smurfs' Happy Halloween party, Gargamel and Hogatha catch Lazy who has been accidentally turned red by Mother Nature. Papa and the Smurfs help Lazy escape while Mother Nature has Father Time help turn Lazy's red into blue just in time for the Halloween party.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Noble Stag: His wicked cousin, Malcolm the Mean, who plans to kill him and mount him in his trophy room, has turned King Gerard into a black stag. The little Smurfs help their friend. When King Gerard is transformed back into his human form, Malcolm becomes imprisoned in the body of the stag.

programme.title: The Whole Smurf And Nothing But The Smurf
programme.desc: The evil wizard Gargamel is able to capture the Smurfette. Now he is going to give her a truth serum and know all of Papa Smurf' secrets… But then Gargamel makes a big mistake and gives the Smurfette a fib formula!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Secret Of Shadow Swamp: Grouchy, the Smurf who hates everything, doubly hates his own birthday party and goes to hide in Shadow Swamp... He is going to meet strange beings and stranger adventures while the other Smurfs search for him...

programme.title: Smurfiplication
programme.desc: The evil wizard Gargamel creates a magic formula that duplicates everything it touches. And surprise! Suddenly there are six Brainy Smurf! This creates a few interesting situations in the Village... And also at Gargamel's!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Traveller: A dragon terrorizes the Village of the Smurfs. To put the dragon to rest, the Smurfs must find the noted Chinese traveler. Fortunately, Papa Smurf is able to understand the strange customs of the stranger, and even to speak a few words.

programme.title: The Man In The Moon
programme.desc: Sick and tired of not being appreciated, the Man in the Moon quits his job and retires on Earth, to the Village of the Smurfs. The absence of a First Quarter Moon wreaks havoc in the customs of the Smurfs, and Mother Nature and Father Time get dragged in...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Pet For Baby Smurf: There is a prize for the cutest pet of a Smurf. Baby Smurf brings a cute, lovely, affectionate Glowing Darling, a pet anybody falls in love with… But this pet is a creation of Gargamel, the evil wizard intent on destroying the Smurfs!

programme.title: Symbols Of Wisdom
programme.desc: Brainy Smurf desperately wants to be more like Papa Smurf. Can a hair tonic be the answer? Can Gargamel be able to finally capture the Smurfs? Does wisdom really reside in a beard?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Gingerbread Smurfs: Brainy feels up to the occasion when he starts the recipe for cookies. He is sure to win the contest: he borrowed a recipe from Papa Smurf's Book of Magic. But a big surprise, and some nasty happenings, await poor Brainy... and the whole Village.

programme.title: Secret Of The Village Well
programme.desc: Why is Clumsy Smurf waiting day and night near the Village well? What is the wish that he wants to be kept secret? How is Gargamel going to be mixed up in this mysterious affair? Is Gargamel going to catch the Smurfs at last?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Float Full Of Smurfs: The Smurfs must find a bunny family to pull their float in the Autumn Carnival. Gargamel sees his chance to capture the little blue people and disguises himself as a giant bunny. Is he going to catch all the Smurfs in one fell swoop?

programme.title: Stop And Smurf The Roses
programme.desc: Wicked Chlorhydris, the sorceress, wants to destroy all love and beauty on Earth. She has to annihilate Wood Elf Grove, where the loving mute elf Laconia cares for the wild flowers. But the Smurfs are there to save the day.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Jokey's Funny Bone: Jealous of the attention Vanity Smurf receives when he breaks his toe, Jokey Smurf feigns sickness in hopes of getting recognition. Unfortunately, his ploy turns against him and instead of loving care all he receives is the proverbial pound of curse.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Stealing Grandpa's Thunder: The nasty Stalker, who traps wild animals and sells them, has Grandpa and Wild in his clutches. Nanny and Smoogle come to the rescue, catching the Stalker in one of his own traps.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurf The Presses: Reporter writes that Gargamel wants to be friends with the Smurfs, after hearing something out of context. Gargamel talks Reporter into taking him to Smurf Village to make his announcement in person. When Gargamel kidnaps the Smurfs, it's up to Reporter to write them out of a tight corner.

programme.title: Bungling Babysitters
programme.desc: While Handy, Brainy, and Greedy argue, Hogatha kidnaps Baby for her Formula for baby-soft skin. It's up to the quarrelling trio, plus Smoogle, to rescue Baby from Hogatha's clutches.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Bigmouth's Roommate: Gargamel throws Scruple out, so he moves in with Bigmouth. When the Smurflings help Bigmouth throw a party, Scruple captures them to get into Gargamel's good graces again. But he doesn't count on Bigmouth coming to the rescue.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Incredible Shrinking Wizard: Gargamel has thrown in his slime pond so much poisonous muck that the water becomes enchanted and Gargamel, after falling in, suddenly finds himself much smaller that he would wish. Actually he is going to be so small that Papa Smurf will save him!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Circus For Baby: It must be a coincidence: just as an elephant crosses the forest and meets baby Smurf, the Smurfs decide to create a big Smurf Circus. They are going to meet the infernal sorcerer Balthazar and Baby Smurf will have a lot of fun...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hopping Cough Smurfs: The evil wizard Gargamel spreads the forest with the germs of the uncontrollable hopping cough. Baby Smurf is the first victim and all the Village of the Smurfs goes frantic with worry... Fortunately, Papa Smurf thinks there might be a cure.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurf On Wood: The evil wizard Gargamel once again meets Esmeralda, the gypsy fortune-teller, and she finds a novel way of getting the gold coin that Gargamel imprudently shows her. But the Smurfs in their turn are tricked into believing there is such a thing as a good-luck tree...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Little Orange Horse With Gold Shoes: Sliding down a rainbow, a little winged horse loses a golden shoe. He meets the Smurfette and she helps him look for his lost horseshoe. They fall in love somehow, for who could be unmoved by the charm of a little orange horse... Or of a Smurfette?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Master Smurf: There is an evil power in the Titan's crown that Miner Smurf finds underground. And Greedy Smurf is the Smurf to fall victim to it. Then Gargamel comes up with some new schemes to destroy the Smurfs, and everything gets hopelessly tangled.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Tear Of A Smurf: A beautiful princess is turned into a hag and needs the whiskers of a cat and the tear of a Smurf for her magic potion. Azrael, Grouchy and Jokey unwittingly cooperate and as the magical transformation takes place, the princess frees them and they happily hurry home.

programme.title: How To Smurf A Rainbow
programme.desc: Mother Nature is too busy to conjure a rainbow for the Smurfs' festival, so Papa Smurf borrows her cookbook and mixes up the recipe himself. As there is no yellow available, they use the leprechaun's gold to produce a beautiful rainbow before Gargamel can steal it.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Chip Off The Old Smurf: Disaster strikes when Brainy and Baby mix up Papa Smurf's formulas, leaving them powerless before an army of hungry locusts unleashed on the forest by Gargamel.

programme.title: Lumbering Smurfs
programme.desc: Greedy tree cutters plan to chop down King Gerard's forest while he is away on vacation. Papa Smurf disguises the Smurfs as ghosts to scare the lumberjacks who willingly surrender to the returning King and his array.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Hovel Is Not A Home: In his search for a grander hovel, Gargamel looks in the Great Book of Spells to conjure up a new home. But all of his spells backfire and that convinces him that there's no place like home!

programme.title: Speak For Yourself, Farmer Smurf
programme.desc: Farmer hides his love for Smurfette by assuming a disguise and sending her poems. When they finally meet, they are captured by Bigmouth and in their struggle to get free, they discover their mutual friendship.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hefty's Heart: Gargamel infects Hefty's heart with hate and then uses the little Smurf as a decoy for the others. Fortunately, Hefty's love overcomes his hate and he helps his little friends escape from Gargamel's clutches.

programme.title: To Smurf A Thief
programme.desc: The Smurfs and Homnibus befriend an unfortunate boy who is forced to steal for his master. Soon, the evil thief is turned over to the magistrate and the boy is happy to live with Homnibus.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Forget-Me-Smurfs: Little Sickly turns into a hero when he forgets his ailments and saves the rest of the Smurfs from the deadly forget-me flowers.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Willpower Smurfs: The Smurfs are so busy testing their individual willpower that they fail to notice Gargamel has captured Harmony. Only when Papa Smurf offers Gargamel a trick box to test his willpower does Harmony escape.

programme.title: Clumsy Luck
programme.desc: The Smurfs learn about superstition when Clumsy breaks Vanity's mirror prior to a meteor shower. When a meteor falls on Clumsy's house, everyone attributes it to bad luck, but realize the foolishness of this philosophy when they see Clumsy was not in the house at the time.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Greedy And The Porridge Pot: The good fairy, Guinilda gives Greedy a magic porridge pot that Brainy causes to overflow into the village and forest. The good-hearted fairy hurries to the rescue and then asks for the pot back to give to an orphanage of hungry children.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Handy's Sweetheart: Handy learns it's better to have smurfed than not to have smurfed at all when he learns his true love is really a mermaid. Can they really live with each other forever?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Time Capsule: As the Smurfs busily build a time capsule for all of their talents, Papa Smurf frantically tries to unravel an ancient Druid riddle before disaster strikes the forest.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Baby's First Christmas: The wonderful joy of Christmas for Baby Smurf and everyone else is almost ruined by the evil Chlorhydris who puts a spell on Mr. Nicholas to stop him from spreading holiday cheer. Fortunately, Papa Smurf and his little blue creatures break the spell and Christmas spreads over the land once more.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Springtime: The wicked wizard Gargamel asks the sorcerer Balthazar for a recipe to capture the Smurfs. It involves kidnapping Mother Nature to stop the arrival of Spring. Luckily, the Smurfs save the day.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfic Games: The Smurfs discover the spirit and joy of friendly competition when they hold their first "Smurfic Games". After a near miss with the troublesome cat Azrael, the Smurfs decide they need to get into better shape. Papa Smurf suggests that the Smurfs tone their bodies as well as sharpen their athletic abilities by inaugurating the "Smurfic Games".

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Pussywillow Pixies: Clumsy Smurf's misadventures take him across a river into Pussywillow Hollow. There he meets the Pixies – charming and shapely beings whose enemies, the Wartmongers, will meet the Smurfs in some unforeseen ways.

programme.title: Gargamel's Mis-Fortune
programme.desc: Gargamel, the evil but incompetent wizard, tries to trick Esmeralda, the gypsy, into giving him a formula to catch the Smurfs. Of course the gypsy proves to be much smarter than Gargamel, and the Smurfs even more so.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Tick Tock Smurfs: The village of the Smurfs used to live without a clock. But now suddenly time becomes a precious commodity and Brainy Smurf designs a schedule to take advantage of the new Village clock... Can the Smurfs survive the attacks of time?

programme.title: Hefty And The Wheelsmurfer
programme.desc: Hefty Smurf learns what is to be handicapped when he breaks his leg. Handy Smurf creates the wheelsmurfer for him, a contraption that will give Hefty some mobility. But suddenly the evil wizard Gargamel appears on the scene.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette's Golden Tresses: Hogatha, the repulsive witch, captures the Smurfette. She wants to steal from the little blue beauty her golden hair. Can the Smurfs save their little female companion before it is too late? Can Hogatha grow hair like Smurfette's?

programme.title: Monster Smurfs
programme.desc: This is spook-a-Smurf eve, and all the Smurfs get ready for the fancy dress party… But Brainy Smurf gets hold of Papa Smurf's Book of Magic, and all the Smurfs are changed into hideous but funny creatures. Yet danger lurks...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurf The Other Cheek: Hefty Smurf meets an old Trolless in the forest, and the old crone begs him to relieve her of a red spot on her nose by... giving her a good kick here and now! Hefty half-heartedly obliges... And the result is a big surprise for him!

programme.title: The Trojan Smurf
programme.desc: Gargamel, the evil wizard, has devised a new plan to capture the Smurfs: he builds a giant statue in the shape of Papa Smurf. Thus, he hopes, the Smurfs are going to drag the statue into their Village.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Patchwork Bear: There isn't a River Smurf anymore: someone has frozen it near its source. The Smurfs go to the Emerald Empress' country to see what the trouble is, and they meet the Patchwork Bear as well as the Iron Pyrites...

programme.title: Smurfette's Sweet Tooth
programme.desc: Once a year, Greedy Smurf makes a special batch of Smurfberry candy. Every Smurf receives a whole year's provision of the smurfiest candy in the whole world. But can a Smurf keep his provision for a whole year? Can the Smurfette?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Breakfast At Greedy's: This time, Gargamel feels sure of himself. Well, almost. He is going to try and finally catch the little Smurfs! Greedy Smurf's lighter-than-air pancakes are almost responsible for the Smurfs floating into Gargamel's grasp...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Petrified Smurfs: Brainy Smurf's done it again. This time, in front of Papa Smurf, too. He has recited a spell that changes everything to stone. Everything including himself and all the Smurfs and the Village, and the forest around for miles... Fortunately, Peewit appears....

programme.title: The Bignose Dilemma
programme.desc: Vanity dislikes having the same blue nose as any other Smurf. What he needs is something special... Bignose, Bigmouth's fiancée, also wants to change her nose. And so, by the way, does Gargamel. Some nose exchanging takes place...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Denisa's Greedy Doll: Gargamel's niece Denisa leaves her doll at his house, so he uses it to cast a controlling spell on Greedy. Gargamel nearly traps the Smurfs, until Papa turns the tables on him and returns the doll to Denisa

programme.title: Don Smurfo's Uninvited Guests
programme.desc: Thanks to Brainy, he, Nanny, and Snappy end up in a Don Smurfo storybook. If they don't get out by the last page, they'll be trapped in there forever. While Painter paints them out of danger, Papa races to prepare the potion in time.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Clumsy In Command: Nobody wants to go when Clumsy leads a hike to Mount Majestic, so Papa suggests a two-team race to the summit. Brainy's team is sure they'll win, but Clumsy proves that persistence and caring are just as important as brains when he rescues Brainy's team from a falling boulder and wins the race.
